EmailTemplate.name: BlueWave Bonus Kickoff
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing BlueWave Bonuses
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We're thankful for you!
BlueWave depends on you to deliver solar to our customers. To demonstrate our appreciation we are introducing BlueWave Bonuses.
To congratulate you for becoming a new BlueWave partner (or reward you for continued deals), we will now be offering rewards for individual sales representatives based on loans closed.
BlueWave Bonuses kicks off after your first deal with a sweet Patagonia gift for your holiday travels!
Following this entry gift, we will be sending you cash rewards for every 5th deal you complete with BlueWave financing.
We will be running this promotion for a limited time only, please read eligibility requirements below.
Eligibility & Program Details:
Promotion will be linked to email used for BlueWave portal login You must use an individual email account to be eligible, email log-ins shared within companies are not eligible for Bonus rewards. If you need support adding logins for individual reps we are happy to help! Limit: 1 promotional item per login per achievement reached Promotion begins with all deals closed starting on 11/21/2017 Mass Solar Loan deals are not eligible for this promotion Promotion valid while supplies last
Thank you for working to make Solar for Everyone, Everywhere a reality.
We cannot wait to celebrate your achievements.
- All of us here at BlueWave (888) 817-2703 partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com
